name: LTN_Combinator_Fix
title: LTN Combinator for 1.1
author: dockmeister, MissCatTrap
description: DO NOT have LTN Combinator installed. Fixed for Factorio version 0.18.27 and above. Adds a new type of Constant Combinators to the game. They come with a custom GUI to ease the control of LTN signals. Original by Dockmeister.
